mapper.update: update gulimall_wms.wms_ware_sku set stock=stock+#{stock} where sku_id=#{skuId} and ware_id = #{wareId}
update gulimall_wms.wms_ware_sku set stock_locked = stock_locked-#{skuNum} where sku_id=#{skuId} and ware_id=#{wareId}
update gulimall_wms.wms_ware_sku set stock_locked = stock_locked+#{num} where sku_id=#{skuId} and ware_id=#{wareId} and stock-wms_ware_sku.stock_locked>=#{num}
mapper.select: select ware_id from gulimall_wms.wms_ware_sku where sku_id=${skuId} and stock-wms_ware_sku.stock_locked>0
